name: examples-aws-lambda
description: Passkit-generator examples for running in AWS Lambda
author: Alexander P. Cerutti <cerutti.alexander@gmail.com>

scripts.service:link-pg: cd ../.. && npm run build && npm link
scripts.postinstall: npm run service:link-pg && npm link passkit-generator
scripts.example: npx serverless@3 offline --host 0.0.0.0; :'specifying host due to WSL limits'
